name: tm31
effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Mud-Slap Gen I: Mimic)

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
